Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Timer(int seconds, int increment, boolean isHumanTimer)
      Timer constructor, initialzes seconds, minutes, increment, timer possesion status and counter counter is set to number of FPS
